docs.lead_paragraph: The largest Congregational Church of New Jersey has begun the erection of a People's Palace, in which there will be dancing and card games as well as church meetings and Sunday school. The cornerstone of the structure was laid yesterday on Jersey City Heights.

headline.main: A $100,000 CHURCH GIFT; Cornerstone of People's Palace Laid in Jersey City. Pastor Scudder Will Have It Fitted Up for Sunday School, and Dancing, Cards, and Theatricals.
